stimulusHtml: The choice of imagery on the breastplate of the individual depicted was most likely intended to elicit which of the following responses from viewers?

features.html: Â© Erin Babnik/Alamy

choicesHtml: Reverence for his status as only prophet of a single true deity
Appreciation of his services as protector of peace and prosperity
Empathy for his display of humility and earthly suffering
Fear of his power to hand out judgment and punishment to his people
